CustomField.formula:
IF(ShippingState = "ON", Estimated_Order_Subtotal__c * 0.13,
IF(ShippingState = "AB", Estimated_Order_Subtotal__c * 0.05,
IF(ShippingState = "BC", Estimated_Order_Subtotal__c * 0.12,
IF(ShippingState = "MB", Estimated_Order_Subtotal__c * 0.12,
IF(ShippingState = "NB", Estimated_Order_Subtotal__c * 0.15,
IF(ShippingState = "NL", Estimated_Order_Subtotal__c * 0.15,
IF(ShippingState = "NT", Estimated_Order_Subtotal__c * 0.05,
IF(ShippingState = "NS", Estimated_Order_Subtotal__c * 0.15,
IF(ShippingState = "NU", Estimated_Order_Subtotal__c * 0.05,
IF(ShippingState = "PE", Estimated_Order_Subtotal__c * 0.15,

IF(ShippingState = "SK", Estimated_Order_Subtotal__c * 0.11,
IF(ShippingState = "YT", Estimated_Order_Subtotal__c * 0.05,0)))))))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Estimated tax amount may differ from actual taxes and should only be used to support manual tax calculation
CustomField.label: Estimated Taxes
